thread.title: Roy Tompkins
thread.title_full: Premium Mortgage reviewed by Roy Tompkins

author: Roy Tompkins
title: Roy Tompkins
text: Everyone at Premium works super hard to get your loan closed. You can trust that they have your back from loan origination to underwriting and beyond. You will never be in the dark over the status of your loan at any step in the process. I always confidently refer clients and friends to Premium and often breath a sigh of relief when I know Premium is representing a buyer of one of my listings.
